roleset.name: group together

role.descr: theme, thing incuded in some group
group itself that arg1 is put into

example.name: Arg 1 & LOC
example.text: We called for the assembly of all disgruntled citizens at the town square.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The assembly of the different governing bodies into one major department was his finest achievement as governor.

roleset.note: Roleset based on assemble.02, OntoNotes grouping assembly-n sense 2; maps to VN class herd-47.5.2. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: It required days to transform his assembly of casual auxiliaries into a semblance of the efficient righting force he had professed to lead.
example.arg: into a semblance of the efficient righting force he had professed to lead.

roleset.name: build, create

roles.note: Don't really know why end state is arg4, but it's like this with other "build" verbs so...

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: The assembly of the new bicycle took all day.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry assemble.01, OntoNotes grouping assembly-n sense 3; maps to VN class build-26.1. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Dr. Mann refers to his assembly of data from a number of different sources.
example.arg: from a number of different sources

example.name: Args 0, 1, 4
example.text: John's assembly of a pink huffy from a kit into a mountain-biking machine shocked Mary.
example.note: Arg 4 example invented, awkward but you get the idea?
